alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Franklin; Essex; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 6:46PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Areas of Freezing Rain or Drizzle, then Potential Flash Freeze... Precautionary/Preparedness Actions... Areas of freezing rain and drizzle are following the exiting light to moderate snow showers. Freezing rain or freezing drizzle may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution...especially on bridges...overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly. Temperatures are above freezing...but colder temperatures are expected overnight causing any water or slush to quickly freeze on roads and sidewalks. Untreated surfaces will become extremely slippery and offer little or no traction. Reduced speeds and greater distance between vehicles is advised. Remember, if roads look wet tonight, assume it`s ice and not water.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Franklin; Essex; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington
